tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: Applause to @HistoryatState and #FSI's Office of the Historian on the release of a new Foreign Relations of the U.S. volume…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Applause to @HistoryAtState and #FSI's Office of the Historian on the release of a new Foreign Relations of the U.S. volume! This volume documents the Reagan administration’s policies toward the Soviet Union from March 1985 to October 1986. twitter.com/HistoryAtState…
